description: The victim, who has Alzheimer's, was attacked in her room during the Covid-19 lockdown.
title: Emmanuel Adeniji: Irish nursing home worker jailed for raping patient
title_page: Emmanuel Adeniji: Irish nursing home worker jailed for raping patient - BBC News
maintext: "We always said we will dread the day she loses her memory, but now one day we hope she wakes up and doesn't remember," she added.
